1994 sita 2015 dakwa rata palanaya chandrika kumarathunga hitapu janadhipathiniya, 2005-2007 kalaye parisara amathi wathman janadhipathi maitha්ripala sirisena, 2007-2010 kalaye parisara amathi champika ranawaka, 2010-2012 parisara amathi anura pa්riyadarshana yapa, 2012-2015 parisara amathi susil pe්ramjayanth athulu siyalu dena ada wana wita yahapalana aanduwe sitina nisa kunu kanda sambandayen siyalu wagakima me aanduwa wisin baragatha yuthu bawath mahinda rajapaksha hitapu janapathi wetha chodana kirima sahamulinma waradi bawath mantha්riwaraya penwa dunneya.

eksath jathika paksha nayaka thanathure dhura kalaya wasara hayakin dirgha kirimata paksha kruthyadhikari mandalaya gath thiranaya sambandhayen labana 28 dina karunu dakwannayi nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha athulu paksha kruthyadhikari mandalayata kolambaa disa adhikaranaya eeye(8) niyoga keleya.adala thiranaya nithi wirodhi, wyawastha wirodhi bawa pawasamin basnahira palath sabha manthri shiran lakthilaka mahatha ejapa nayaka ranilwikramasinha mahatha athulu paksha kruthyadhikari mandalaye 85 denakuta wiruddhawa pawaru naduwak salaka balimen pasuwa kolambaa pradhana disa winisuru dhammika ganepola mahatha withthikaruwanta athuru thahanam danwim nikuth karamin me niyogaya keleya.eksath jathika pakshaye paksha kruthyadhikari mandalaya juli 19 dina raswi adala thiranaya gena athi bawath , paksha wyawasthawa anuwa paksha nayakayage dhura kalaya wasarakata warak raswana kruthyadhikari mandala jandayaki n thiranaya kala yuthu bawath , paminilla wenuwen adhikaranayata karunu idiripath kerini.paksha nayakayage nila kalaya wasarakata warak raswana kruthyadhikari mandala raswimakin thiranaya kala yuthu bawata sandahan "paksha wyawasthawe kondesiya" kruthyadhikari mandala rahas jandayak pawathwa iwath kirima nithi wirodhi bawada, kruthyadhikari mandalaye ema thirana thahanam karana lesada paminilla magin illa sitiyeya.paksha wyawasthawa wenas kirima nithi wirodhi bawata thiranaya kerena niyogayak niku th karana lesada paminillen illa thibini.karunu salaka balu winisuruwaraya withthikaruwan ta athuru thahanam danwim nikuth karamin labana 28 dina adhikaranaye karunu dakwana lesata niyoga keleya.

habawin ma prathamayenma niwandama sanasa samithiye gara sabhapathi thama ne hitapu gamini widuhal widuhalpathi warayeku wu wirasinha skola mahathmaya muna gasi wisthara wimasana ladi.....ema mahathagen lada wistharayata anuwa gampaha sanasa samithiye puhunu kirim kalamanakara jiwandara mahathagenda upades laba gathimi....ema mahathi pawasuye thibbotugeda sanasa samithiyak aarambha kara athi bawath eya athara maga nawathi atha bawath ehi niladhari mandalaya hamuwi sakachchakara nawa sanasa samithiyak goda nagannenam ee sadaha purna sahaya laba dena bawaya....ema samithiye sabhapathi washayen katayuthu kara aththe suriyapala mahathaya .....ma ee mahatha hamu wemin wisthara wimasana ladi ohu wisin pawasa sitiye sanasa samithiya patan aragena tika kalak giyada eya athara maga anahiti bawath ...ema mudal ayithkarawanta laba dimen pasuwa samithiya wisurawa hara athi bawaya....thawada ee mahatha pawasa sitiye me game kisima deyak sarthakawa karagena yamata nohaki bawayi......eheth ema adahasa kese wuwada.eya kalayuthu deyak bawin nawatha aarambha karannenam ma da ee sadaha kamaththen sitina bawath pawasana ladi...nawathath amarawe watimata ohu akamathi bawath ...eya amarawe watena karanak bawath pawasana ladi.....eheth ohu wisin gama wenuwen ganna lada ema uthsahaya agaya kala yuthu wanne sanasa samithiyaka agaya watahagena game ayawalun sadaha ese samithiyak aarambha kirimata katayuthu kirima nisaya....
